hints: Initially, the reward are ranked by {min2}, {min1}, {mid}, {max1}, {max2}
Track the sequence of arms you pull to correctly attribute delayed rewards.
Keep a running record of which arm was pulled three trials before each reward.
For the first few trials, rewards will be zero until the delay period is complete.
The reward you're seeing now is from the arm you pulled three trials ago.
The relationship between your current pull and current reward is displaced in time.
